```{r}
library(tidyverse)
wildfires <- read_csv("Dashboard/FW_Veg_Rem_Combined.csv")
```

```{r}
cause_freq <- wildfires %>%
  group_by(stat_cause_descr) %>%
  summarize(frequency = n())

cause_plot <- ggplot(data = wildfires, aes(x = stat_cause_descr)) + geom_bar() + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1))

cause_plot
```
```{r}
wildfires_sample <- wildfires %>%
  head(5)

# convert to tibble 
sample_tibble <- as_tibble(wildfires_sample)
class(sample_tibble)

library(sf)

sample_tibble %>%
  st_as_sf(coords = c("longitude", "latitude"))

library(tigris)
library(leaflet)

states <- states(cb = TRUE)

leaflet(states) %>%
  addProviderTiles("CartoDB.Positron") %>%
  addPolygons(fillColor = "white",
              color = "black",
              weight = 0.5) %>%
  setView(-98.5795, 39.8282, zoom=3) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(~sample_tibble$longitude, ~sample_tibble$latitude,
                  popup = ~sample_tibble$X1, label = ~sample_tibble$X1)
  #addMarkers(data = sample_tibble, popup = ~X1)
```
